body:
This seems fine, though you have some trouble with your requirements files in CI. I'm not convinced that the sequence diagram adds much, since it is a trivial sequence. I find more value in those when it is not strictly back and forth. (If we do keep it, I'm fine with how it is included here. I also don't know a good text based format for this, unless we do ascii art).

Also, we should build the docs in CI. We could even have CircleCI save them as artifacts so we can look at them, if we wanted.
